an6.81:4.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an6.81:4.3: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, pāpiccho ca, micchādiṭṭhi ca.
an6.81:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an6.81:5.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an6.81:5.3: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, appiccho ca, sammādiṭṭhi ca.
an6.81:5.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
